thumbs.productDescription: Club Penguin Igloo Play Set (Ages 5+) An Igloo Play Set stores up to 15 penguin figures, has a moving dance floor with music, and a shooting cannon with a basketball hoop! Igloo Play Sets come with 1 penguin figure and 1 puffle figure. Each play set has a plastic coin with a code on one side that can unlock items on Club Penguin. Available at North American Toys“R”Us Stores, The Club Penguin Online Shop, Disney Stores, and the North American Disney Theme Parks.
